inputs.name: serverEndpoint
inputs.label: StormRunner Load Service Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your StormRunner Load server.

inputs.name: tenantid
inputs.label: Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your tenant id, specified in your StormRunner URL. For example: https://stormrunner-load.saas.hpe.com/home/?TENANTID=354274891. In this example, TenantID is 354274891

inputs.name: projectid
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your projectId, specified in your StormRunner URL. For example: https://stormrunner-load.saas.hpe.com/home/?TENANTID=354274891&projectId=1. In this example, projectId is 1

inputs.name: testid
inputs.label: Test Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Navigate to Load Tests > Overview > General Information to see the (Id)testID.

inputs.name: sendEmail
inputs.label: Send e-mail to the preset address
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether send an e-mail to the preset address after test
